title: Midfight Weapon Exchange
content: The commentary track says that Liz and Will have been working out their sexual tension since the first movie - since they certainly wouldn't be allowed to sleep together - by close dancing and practicing swordfighting. Lots and lots of swordfighting. Pintel and Ragetti never had a chance to really show off their swordsmanship or coordination in the first film, and they are pirates with at least ten years' experience each.
